_header: Change this name thou man of pride

NLS1844.Transcription:
Chaunge þis name þov man of prydeTake to þi hous
                    þem þat hafs nedeMartyn þe naked lazare þe
                    drerieJames þe Pylgryme and þat are werye
NLS1844.Note:
Immediately follows 723
                    and possibly second stanza of same.
NLS1844.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.499.
